policy.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <wsp:MessagePredicate Dialect="http://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xpath-19991116" L7p:variablePrefix="typeInteger" wsp:Usage="wsp:Required" xmlns:exp="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy/export" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tns="http://qaschematest.layer7.com/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">/soapenv:Envelope/soapenv:Body/tns:Echo/tns:inPerson/tns:Age</wsp:MessagePredicate> <L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:Predicates predicates="included"> <L7p:item dataType="included"> <L7p:Type type="boolean"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Predicates> <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${typeInteger.result}"/> <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/> </L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion> <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://hugh/WebServiceForSchemaTest/Service1.asmx"/> <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/> <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Rules> </L7p:RequestHeaderRules> <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/> <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/> </L7p:RequestParamRules> <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Rules> </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules> </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>
